Let me tell you what you did that was moding, Thecode. To start out, 
read one of your recent post:

...they walked off together, coming to the Maximal base, and using a 
new device stolen from somewhere to dig under and into the 
Ark.......they destroyed all of the autoguns, becoming decently 
damaged in the process...they smiled at each other and searched until 
they found the secret location of the Autobots...

Ok, now: the fact that Plintissa and Sinesis used 'a new device  
stolen from somewhere to dig under the Ark' and destroyed all the 
autoguns in one e-mail is severe moding in the first place. You 
didn't give anyone else a chance to respond. If you would have, 
though, your little mission would have been impossible due to the 
dozen or so maximals in the Ark at this point. Second, if you would 
remember, Blue Stinger got the Autobots out of the Ark, so finding 
them there would be phisically impossible. Over all, if you would 
have done this properly, you'd be stopped by the shields, slagged by 
the autoguns, and chased off by the maximals that were there.
